entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Red Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:57 PM CST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Red Lake Airport 02:00 AM CST Tuesday 17 January 2023
Temperature: -8.2°C
Pressure: 101.0 kPa
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -9.8°C
Wind: N 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of freezing drizzle. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of freezing drizzle or light snow changing to 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 5:40 PM CST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 5:40 PM CST Monday 16 January 2023
